title: Taco Casserole
directions: Shredded Lettuce. diced tomatoes,sour cream.guacamole,salsa, jalapenos or any taco toppings you might like
Brown beef and onion in skillet ,drain off any fat add seasoning mix according to package directions
Layer ingredients in 9 x 13 pan as listed â€“ crushed chips, seasoned meat and 2/3 of cheese
Remove from oven and top with shredded lettuce tomatoes and remaining cheese along with any of you favorite taco toppings
ingredients: 1 lb lean or extra lean ground beef
1 pkg. taco seasoning, mixed according to directions
